Key.English: When disconnecting save player information and position. When reconnecting load the player information
Key.Spanish: Al desconectar guardar la informacion y la posicion del jugador. Al reconectar cargar la informacion del jugador

Key.English: Delete old bodies when rejoining (Applicable if save status is enabled)
Key.Spanish: Borrar cuerpos antiguos al volver a unirse (Aplicable si guardar estado esta activado)

Key.English: This module allows Join In Progress disabling respawn. Requires (respawn = BASE) or (respawn = 3)
Key.Spanish: Este modulo permite join in progress desactivando la reaparicion. Requiere (respawn = BASE) o (respawn = 3)
